languages.text: "Казнить бы тебя на месте, Мейв, чтобы ты не ударила в спину..."
"I ought to have you executed on the spot, Maive, before you stab me in the back..."
languages.original_text: "Казнить бы тебя на месте, Мейв, чтобы ты не ударила в спину..."

traits.locale_text: "I ought to have you executed on the spot, Maive, before you stab me in the back..."
"I ought to have you executed on the spot, Maive, before you stab me in the back..."

languages.text: 「メイヴ、君が{mf|俺|私}の背中を刺す前に、その場で処刑してやるべきだったな…」
languages.original_text: "I ought to have you executed on the spot, Maive, before you stab me in the back..."

traits.locale_text: 「メイヴ、君が{mf|俺|私}の背中を刺す前に、その場で処刑してやるべきだったな…」

languages.text: "Belki de beni sırtımdan bıçaklamadan önce seni hemen burada idam ettirmeliyim Maive..."
languages.original_text: "I ought to have you executed on the spot, Maive, before you stab me in the back..."

traits.locale_text: "Belki de seni hemen burada idam etmeliyim Maive, beni sırtımdan bıçaklamadan önce..."

languages.text: «Debería ejecutarte aquí mismo, Maive, antes de que me apuñales por la espalda...».
languages.original_text: "I ought to have you executed on the spot, Maive, before you stab me in the back..."

traits.locale_text: «Debería ejecutarte aquí mismo, Maive, antes de que me apuñales por la espalda...».

languages.text: “恐怕我只能当场把你处决，梅芙，以免你在我背后捅刀……”
languages.original_text: "I ought to have you executed on the spot, Maive, before you stab me in the back..."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕我只能当场把你处决，梅芙，以免你在我背后捅刀……”

languages.text: « Je devrais vous faire exécuter sur-le-champ, Maive, avant que vous me plantiez un poignard dans le dos... »
languages.original_text: "I ought to have you executed on the spot, Maive, before you stab me in the back..."

traits.locale_text: « Je devrais vous faire exécuter sur-le-champ, Maive, avant que vous me plantiez un poignard dans le dos... »

languages.text: "Ich solle Euch auf der Stelle exekutieren, bevor Ihr mir in den Rücken fallt ..."
languages.original_text: "I ought to have you executed on the spot, Maive, before you stab me in the back..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich solle Euch auf der Stelle exekutieren, bevor Ihr mir in den Rücken fallt ..."
